subject: My newbie two cents
author: mrscaptainjack2
full_text:
For the record, although I went into this with hopes of reaching my dad and brother, I have failed to do so.  I also went into this expecting to be lied to.  Don't know for sure if that's happened so far.

I agree with you about the "not completely conscious" statement (in my humble opinion).  If what traditional paranormal literature tells us is true, the other side sounds very similar to the dream state -- and we all know what our dreams are like.  Let's just for a moment assume we are dealing with dead people:  if a person were to somehow get stuck in a bad state (something similar to the state where weird, frightening dreams are made), he might predict some frightening, strange stuff -- not out of maliciousness, but because he doesn't know better.
